item.title: Beginner's Guide to Communication in FOSS
item.description: Free and Open Source software is maintained by people working remotely from around the world. Hence, effective communication is important for any project to function smoothly.

item.title: Plain English for Everyone
item.description: Plain English is clear and concise English. Technical writing is different from creative writing. The goal of technical documentation is to make complex technical information easy to understand.
